Package <Unnamed>

Class Summary
assignments Servlet implementation class assignments

This servlet check if the session is valid or not.
DataBase Database class has methods connect() and close()
functions This class holds all the methods used by all the servelts, which returns the appropriate data to the respective servlet calling it.
in_progress Servlet implementation class in_progress

This servlet check if the session is valid or not, if valid it displays the details of assignments which are in progress and which still have some time for the deadline.
my_details Servlet implementation class my_details

This servlet check if the session is valid or not, if it is valid, then displays the user and group details of the user.
Session This class holds the methods for controlling sessions

The class variables request, EID, UID, session are declared as static because, the same copy of these variable must be accessed by all of the instances.
sign_in Servlet implementation class sign_in

This servlet has login page in the doGet method and based on the input it checks if the user is valid or not, if valid, then creates a session and show the appropriate data.
sign_off Servlet implementation class sign_off

This servlet invalidates the session and redirect to sign_off html page.
status_update Servlet implementation class status_update

This servlet check the session is valid or not, if valid, then allow the user to update the status of assignment by submitting form to status_update_reply.
status_update_reply Servlet implementation class status_update_reply

This servlet check the session is valid or not, if valid, then show the update operation reply and allow the user to update the status of assignment.
